G

game_service - Interface in api
This interface represents the main functionality of the game-server, allowing a User the following: 1. construct_a_Game(int type); 2. getInfo(); getGraph(), getAgents(), getPokemon(); // JSON format: 3. locateAgents(); 4. start_game() 5. move(); // move all Agents 6. chooseNextEdge(int agentID, int destNodeID); //main algorithm 7. stop_game() 8. login(long id): (for reporting the results of Ex2)

geo_location - Interface in api
This interface represents a geo location (x,y,z), aka Point3D

This class represents a geo location (x,y,z), aka Point3D
